.#{$prefix}grid-row,
.#{$prefix}grid-data-row {
    outline: none; // prevent dotted outline in firefox when focused
}

.#{$prefix}grid-view {
    overflow: hidden;
    position: relative;
}

.#{$prefix}grid-table {
    table-layout: fixed;
    border-collapse: separate;
}

.#{$prefix}grid-td {
    overflow: hidden;
    border-width: 0;
    vertical-align: top;
}

.#{$prefix}grid-cell-inner {
    overflow: hidden;
    white-space: nowrap;
    zoom: 1;
}

.#{$prefix}grid-resize-marker {
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 5;
    top: 0;
}
